name: Wizardly Workshop: Using Blockchain and AI to Conjure Digital Objects in the Real World
description:
Session Runner: Vlad Avesalon, aka The Professor & Navneet Saxena, co-founders of Vennity, will lead the session

Welcome to the Wizardly Workshop, an immersive session where we'll learn how to bring our imagination to life using the power of AI art tools like Midjourney and geo-fenced NFTs using Vennity.

This workshop is for brand marketers, digital content creators, game designers, and tech enthusiasts eager to explore the cutting-edge intersection of augmented reality, artificial intelligence, and blockchain technology.

Prof. will begin by demystifying the complex world of AI and blockchain, explaining how these technologies can work together to create and manage digital objects in the real world. This will include an overview of how AI can generate unique, personalized digital collectibles and how blockchain ensures their authenticity and ownership.

The session will then move onto a practical ideation exercise. We'll get the opportunity to brainstorm and discuss how to use these technologies to create your own magical world of digital collectibles. 

At the end of the Wizardly Workshop, we will walk away with a comprehensive understanding of the potential of AI and blockchain in the creation of digital collectibles and have a conceptual framework for your own digital collectibles campaign. Prepare for a magical, tech-filled adventure!

speakers.name: Vlad Avesalon
speakers.bio: Vlad Avesalon is a co-founder and leads product and design at Vennity, a location-based digital collectibles platform. Vlad has been developing Solidity smart contracts for three years and was a software engineer in the healthcare IT space with Epic Systems prior to going full time as a founder in the web3 space.

speakers.name: Navneet Saxena (Vennity/Google)
speakers.bio:
Navneet, co-founder at Vennity, a blockchain-based gamified mapping platform for brand engagement, also serves as Finance/Strategy Lead at Google, with experience in geo-expansion and global public sector teams. Prior to Google, he worked in management consulting, focusing on Fortune 500 Energy clients, and in Investment Banking handling cross-border middle-market M&A deals. Navneet holds an MBA with an Entertainment Specialization from UCLA Anderson and a BS in Finance/Economics from the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign. Beyond work, he enjoys international road trips, options trading, and amateur astronomy.

https://www.linkedin.com/in/navneetsaxena/
